- The diamond cards (♦) are prioritized, especially the higher ranks.
- The cards in the list are:

The diamond cards (D10, D11, D12, D13) are all valuable, with higher ranks being more favorable. The red hearts (H3, H5, H7, H9) are less favorable compared to the diamonds, but they still contribute positively. The black clubs (C1, C2) are the least favorable.

Given the above considerations, I will prioritize the diamond cards, especially the higher ranks, and include a few of the other options to fill the list.
